attributes.action: Bring back NHS dentistry for all
attributes.additional_details:
1) If not already the case, all dentists to be subject to the NHS Charter, as GP's and hospitals currently are.
2) All dentists that left the NHS because the contracts changed all those years ago, to have their right to practice dentistry revoked, unless they return to NHS dentistry, for all age groups.
3) No punative dental charges on people like me, who have not had access to NHS dentistry for far too many years, and no doubt need lots of expensive remedial work.
4) No dentist has the right to refuse to take someone on as a NHS patient if the patient wants to join under the NHS.
